TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR USING THE APPLICATION EVA FACIAL MOUSE
 
 These Terms and Conditions regulate the download, access and use of the mobile application "EVA FACIAL MOUSE" (hereinafter the "Application"), which CREA Sistemas Informaticos (hereinafter "CREA") and the Vodafone Spain Foundation (hereinafter "VSF") release to users.
 
 This version of the application is available for free.
 
 Access to the Application means that the user has accepted these Terms and Conditions and has totally agreed to them 
 
 1. SCOPE
 
 The Application aims to help improve physical accessibility for people with difficulties in handling mobile devices and/or Android tablets. The Application provides an alternative method of access (hands-free) for those people who, for whatever reason, cannot make a regular use of mobile devices in order to take advantage and use them on equal terms.
 
 Some of the groups that can benefit from this project are people with amputations, cerebral palsy, spinal cord injury, muscular dystrophy, multiple sclerosis, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) and other diseases or disabilities. Specialised professionals and a test group of users have participated in the designing and development of this Application.
 
 The application is available to users for their personal use (never business).
 
 It runs on an Android 4.1 mobile phone or higher equipped with a front camera.
